devdoc.author: Team: Jessica Marshall, Ashoka Finley
devdoc.details: This library is imported into all the Registries to manage project interactions

calculatePassAmount(address).return: Sum of the weightings of the task which have passed.

calculateWeightOfAddress(address,address.details: Returns an average of the token staking and reputation staking to understand the relative influence of a staker
calculateWeightOfAddress(address,address.return: The relative weight of a staker as a whole integer

checkActive(address,bytes32,uint256,addr.details: The nextDeadline value for the active state is set in the project state variables.

params._taskHash: Address of the top weighted task hash

checkActive(address,bytes32,uint256,addr.return: Returns a bool denoting the project is in the active state.

checkEnd(address,address,address,address.details: The project pass passThreshold is set in the project state variables

params._hyphaTokenAddress: Address of the systems token contract
params._plcrVoting: Address of the systems PLCR Voting contract
params._tokenRegistryAddress: Address of the systems token registry contract

checkEnd(address,address,address,address.return: Returns a bool denoting if the project is its final state.

checkStaked(address).details: The nextDeadline value for the staked state is set in the project state variables.
checkStaked(address).return: Returns a bool denoting the project is in the staked state.

checkValidate(address,address,address).details: This is an interative function and gas costs will vary depending on the number of tasks.

params._hyphaTokenAddress: Address of the systems HyphaToken contract
params._tokenRegistryAddress: Address of the systems Token Registry contract

checkValidate(address,address,address).return: Returns a bool denoting if the project is in the validation state.

checkVoting(address,address,address,addr.details: This is an interative function and gas costs will vary depending on the number of tasks.

params._hyphaTokenAddress: Address of the systems token contract
params._plcrVoting: Address of the systems PLCR Voting contract
params._tokenRegistryAddress: Address of the systems token registry contract

checkVoting(address,address,address,addr.return: Returns a bool denoting if the project is in the voting state.

params._claimer: Address of account claiming task reward.
params._index: Index of the task in project task array

claimTaskReward(address,uint256,address).return: The amount of reputation the claimer staked on the task

isStaked(address).return: A boolean representing the project staked status

isStaker(address,address).details: Used to define control access to relevant project functions

refundStaker(address,address,address).details: Calls internal functions to handle either staker case.
refundStaker(address,address,address).return: The amount to be refunded to the staker.

timesUp(address).details: Uses block.timestamp as a time variable. Note that this is subject to variability
timesUp(address).return: A boolean representing whether the project has passed its next deadline.

params._taskIndex: Index of the task in the projects task array

devdoc.title: Function Library for Distribute Network Projects

calculatePassAmount(address).notice: Calculates the amount of tasks that have passed for project at `_projectAddress`

calculateWeightOfAddress(address,address.notice: Calculates the relative staking weight of `_address` on project at `_projectAddress. Weighting is calculated by the proportional amount of both reputation and tokens that have been staked on the project.

checkActive(address,bytes32,uint256,addr.notice: Checks if the project at `_projectAddress` has passed its next deadline, and if a valid task hash exists, meaning that the accounts who have staked on the project have successfully curated a list of tasks relating to project work. If a task hash exists the project is moved to state 3: Active and the next deadline is set. If no task hash exists once the deadline has passed, the project is moved to state 7: Failed.

checkEnd(address,address,address,address.notice: Checks if the project at `_projectAddress` has passed its next deadline. It iterates through the project task list, and checks the projects which have polls to see the poll state. If the poll has passed the task is marked claimable by both the approve validators and the task claimer. Otherwise the task is marked claimable for the deny validators, and the task reward is returned to the networks wei balance. The amount of tasks that have passed is then calculated. If the total weighting of those tasks passes the project passThreshold then the project is moved to state 6: Complete, otherwise it moves to state 7: Expired.

checkStaked(address).notice: Checks if project at `_projectAddress` is fully staked with both reputation and tokens. If the project is staked the project moves to state 2: Staked, and the next deadline is set. If the current time is passed the staking period, the project expires and is moved to state 8: Expired.

checkValidate(address,address,address).notice: Checks if the project at `_projectAddress` has passed its next deadline, and if it has moves the project to state 4: Validation. It interates through the project task list and checks if the project tasks have been marked complete. If a task hasn't been marked complete, its wei reward, is returned to the network balance, the task reward is zeroed.

checkVoting(address,address,address,addr.notice: Checks if the project at `_projectAddress` has passed its next deadline, and if it has, moves the project to state 5: Voting. It iterates through the project task list and checks if there are opposing validators for each task. If there are then its starts a plcr for each disputed task, otherwise it marks the task claimable by the validators, as well as by the reputation holder who claimed the task if the validators approved the task.

claimTaskReward(address,uint256,address).notice: Claim the task reward from task at index `_index` from the task array of project at `_projectAddress`. If task is claimable by the reputation holder, Clears the task reward, and transfers the wei reward to the task claimer. Returns the reputation reward for the claimer.

isStaked(address).notice: Return true if the project at `_projectAddress` is fully staked with both tokens and reputation

isStaker(address,address).notice: Returns true if `_staker` is either a token or reputation staker on project at `_projectAddress`

refundStaker(address,address,address).notice: Refund both either reputation or token staker `_staker` for project at address `_projectAddress`

timesUp(address).notice: Return true if the current time is greater than the next deadline of the project at `_projectAddress`

validate(address,address,uint256,bool).notice: Stake tokens on whether the task at index `i` has been successful or not. Validator `_validator` can validate either approve or deny, with `tokens` tokens.
